articles.description: These are the 10 best images of our spectacular universe taken by NASA telescopes. WHich ones? The James Webb Space Telescope and old faithful, the Hubble Space Telescope.
articles.content: Another Hubble Space Telescope image highlights these 5 galaxies dancing together are known as the Hickson Compact Group 40. They are, in reality, 200,000 lightyears apart. (NASA)
